tool_description: Amateur Radio (Ham Radio) Callsign Lookup API
name: HamDB.org
title: HamDB.org

api_list.name: api
api_list.description: Return callsign in the requested format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hamdb-org.p.rapidapi.com/w1aw/json/rapidapi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hamdb-org.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hamdb-org.p.rapidapi.com/{call}/{format}/rapidapi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hamdb-org.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
